name: Expedition Project
description: Embark on a dangerous expedition beyond the Rust Belt. Expeditions are perilous. Your Raider will carry all their possessions into the unknown beyond the Rust Belt. In return, your next Raider gains a unique edge that lasts until the next Expedition departs.

phases.name: Core Systems
phases.description: Connecting wiring, ventilation, and essential power systems

phases.name: Framework
phases.description: Building the walls and roof, installing core systems and defining the interior layout

phases.name: Outfitting
phases.description: Adding storage, workbenches, utilities, and personal touches

phases.name: Load Stage
phases.description: Loading the caravan with vital supplies. Combat gear, survival equipment, provisions, and repair materials are needed to fully prepare for the Expedition. You need to submit the coin value of items to each category.
